page.title: 16PASTIMES AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: In the Milverton area many activites take place.For children there are guides and brownies and cubs.Discos and barn dances are for all generations and can be very enjoyable. Bar-b-Q's or fork suppers are very nice meals to go to.Fox-hunting is a weekly winter event,meeting at a farm or pub at about 11.00am and not finishing until about 4.00pm. Beagles meet once a week to catch hares or rabbits.Milverton Primary School and many churches hold fetes at least once a year and the Dramatic society do one or two plays a year.Gymkanas and dog shows are popular competitive events usually.There are many riding schools in the area where young and old alike can learn to ride.Cricket,football and rounders are played by families or groups in the parks and fields.
